text: Can you help me record my blood pressure and heart rate?
Sure, I can help you with that.

output.name: RecordHealthData
output.description: This API records the health history of a patient given user ID, time and health data.

time.description: The time of health data. Format: %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

health_data.description: The health data, with the format like [{'name': 'blood_pressure', 'value': '120/80'}, {'name': 'heart_rate', 'value': '80'}]

text: To proceed, please provide me with your user ID and the time of the health data.
My user ID is ABC123 and the time is 2023-10-18 09:30:00.
Great, now I need your blood pressure and heart rate readings.
The blood pressure reading is 140/80 and the heart rate is 70.
Thanks for the information. Let me record that for you.
Done! Your health data has been recorded.
